release_note: Several minor bug fixes

This update is very big. Speed Edits: They are now non destructive and ready to use in your templates. Custom canvas size: Now you can customize the canvas to any size. Improved performance: Smoother editing better usability.
Several minor bug fixes
This update brings a new and improved help screen to Riveo!

Hi guys We re back with an update to your favorite video editor Riveo! Based on your feedback our team of technical gurus has taken the battle to perfect your video editing process and we are happy to bring you fresh updates. First of all we caught and destroyed those pesky bugs that were wandering around. We know how annoying they can be so our squad of bug busters got to work cleaning up all the little glitches that sneaked into the app. You wanted a better smoother Riveo we heard! So keep enjoying keep creating and keep opening up with Riveo. Don t forget to show us some love by leaving a review. And remember your feedback keeps us going so keep letting us know about any bugs you find or improvements we could make. Enjoy a sleek updated and polished Riveo. Happy editing friends! Peace be with you.

Hello Riveo family! We ve been working hard on our latest update to bring you the coolest video editing experience! We have eliminated some super small bugs that you most likely didn t even know about that they live in our application absolutely free. But don t worry! They are now evicted. Your experience is important to us. So keep creating keep editing stay cool! Remember that even small updates make a BIG difference. We guarantee you a smoother bug free journey so you can continue to inspire your creativity! Thank you for staying with us. We love you very much Riveo family! See you again! I wish you success Your friends from Riveo.

Hello Riveo family! We know how much you love creating meaningful videos with Riveo so we ve spent some time refining and polishing the app to make your experience even better! We ve fixed some minor glitches because let s be honest no one wants bugs. Now go unleash some creative chaos! Edit splice and stitch until your masterpiece is ready to go viral. Thank you for staying with us! Remember we are always here if you need help. Keep practicing your editing skills and stay awesome! Riveo team microphone is muted.

Hello cool cats and kitties! We hope you have a mind blowing journey creating amazing videos with Riveo. We just wanted to leave you with a quick update on your favorite video editing app. Nothing fancy just some minor bug fixes to smooth out those pesky imperfections. So let s continue to create amazing videos! Remember your creativity inspires us and we will work behind the scenes to make Riveo an ongoing pleasure! Stay bright keep using Riveo. You can tell us all your opinions about this application we are very interested to know your opinion. Until the next update peace! Always yours sincerely and with friendliness Generation Z.

Hello Riveo family! We know you create next level content and we love it! To keep you creatively inspired and your videos looking amazing we ve fixed a few annoying bugs. Our tech wizards have been working behind the scenes so you can do what you do best create and innovate! So let s hit the refresh button and get back to implementing your cutting edge ideas without a hitch! Remember at Riveo we are always focused on strengthening your video editing skills and are committed to providing you with the smoothest experience possible. Keep shining keep creating and keep sharing your feedback! We are listening. See you! Your Riveo team. P.S. Always remember to drink enough water. Be friendly be sincere Generation Z.

Hey family we re back with a new update for your favorite video editing app Riveo! We noticed a small annoying bug that was dampening your creative vibes: the internal camera in the app was cramped and wouldn t open when you wanted to record a video. But no need to worry! Our technical team turned up the heat and got everything in order. It s time to return to the director s chair. And don t forget to tag us in your masterpieces. We re rooting for all your incredible ideas The Riveo team Be friendly genuine Gen Z.

Hello dear Riveo family! We listened to your feedback and carefully corrected some things behind the scenes. You know that annoying memory problem when your project was overloaded with sticky notes Well consider it ERADICATE! Now even your sticker heavy videos won t slow down your editorial rhythm. And you know what else We ve also tweaked our AI brush! Now it s sleeker smarter and ready to make your movie effects even more exciting! We understand that your travel videos are a big deal so please continue to share your comments. We are here with full cups of coffee ready to make Riveo the best video editor for you. That s all for now folks although we ll be back soon with more exciting improvements! Keep being awesome keep being creative keep being YOU. Keep spinning your creativity with Riveo! Peace Love and Riveo. Be friendly be genuine Gen Z.

Hello Riveo family! Guess what Your favorite video editing app just got better! We listen to your feedback because we value your opinion. You told us that the asset thumbnails in the timeline were behaving strangely right Instead of following Riveo s usual operating principle they went their own way. But now there are no problems! We ve worked the magic to fix these weird miniatures so they ll be where they re supposed to be. Get ready for a smoother editing experience because your Riveo journey just got an update. Unleash your creativity and continue creating masterpieces without interruption. Remember we are here for you for your feedback and suggestions! You make Riveo the user friendly and enjoyable platform that it is. So keep sharing your comments we want to surprise you even more next time. Stay original stay creative Your friends from Riveo

Hello friends! A huge hello to all Riveo fans! Guess what Your favorite video editing app just got a little better! We did some house cleaning and fixed a few annoying bugs. So no more annoying crashes or glitches when you re getting creative. We re here to make your video editing experience as smooth as possible! We can t wait for you to try this update and experience the improvements. As always please contact us if you have any problems. We are always happy to help. Happy editing! It s time to bring your stories to life. Stay on trend. Stay creative. Live Riveo! Bye

Hello Riveo family! We ve been working to improve Riveo just for you because we know how much you love adding inspiration to your video edits. Remember those fun animated icons Some of them were too extra... we fixed that. They should work better now so you can continue creating those exciting montages that we can t wait to share with the world. Your feedback is our North Star so keep sending them! Seriously drop us a private message and share your thoughts and ideas. We are always listening always evolving always trying to improve our game for you. Peace love and only good vibrations The Riveo team

Hi guys! Get ready because we have some cool updates for you! Now you can share every template you create. Yes you read that right! Create a gorgeous super creative template and share it with your friends your team members or even the whole world. We are sure that your creativity deserves to be noticed! And of course we went and fixed the tricky little mistakes. It s important to us that your experience with Riveo is always smooth and enjoyable. Thank you for using Riveo! Keep editing creating and sharing your masterpieces. We look forward to your new masterpieces!

BIG UPDATE! Now you can create your own templates! Newly available user accounts allow you to sync templates and favorites across devices. Improved localization in all languages. Many small improvements to the user interface. A small remaster of particle effects. A few bug fixes here and there : Marcus
This once again improves video search for a faster twice as enjoyable Riveo!
Some general housework!
Bug Fixes Enjoy !
Bug Fixes Enjoy !
Bug Fixes Enjoy !
Completely redesigned home screen for faster access to your favorite features And as always some smaller bug fixes here and there Enjoy !
Bug fixes Enjoy !
Bugs fixes Enjoy !
Improved sharing to TikTok A number of bug fixes
New Feature: AI Brush allows you take a snapshot of your project and transform with AI. Bug fixes: Improved memory management for running even bigger projects new Brush Enjoy !!!
Overall improvement Bug fix Enjoy !!!
Overall improvement Bug fix Enjoy !!!
Some UI improvements around the media picker. Improved error messaging.
Bug Fixes.
Fixes some bugs when editing compositions with multiple subtitle tracks
Minor changes.
Bug Fixes.

Adds localisation for traditional Chinese Fixes an issue with natural and GI shadows on text when a style is applied Fixes FPS resolution selection on iPad Fixes an issue with searching in stock footage Fixes some typos Fixes an issue with previewing shadows on some transitions

Hey there Our team prepared exciting stuff in this new version. What s new: AI Filter maker. You need to check this out! Stock footage library Exported video size can now be controlled and obviously bug fixes! The Riveo Team
Bug fixes and improvements.
Bugfixes and improvements.
Discover the all new AI subtitles! Add incredibly precise transcription to your videos in just one tap. Make your videos accessible to anyone watching without sound without effort!
Bugfixes improvements.
This version provides some stability fixes.
Bugfixes and improvements.

So much has happened. 20 new image effects. Images and shapes each have two new types of shadows. Three new templates. One new effect. Visual cues for undo and redo operations. And now you can share your work as images! A number of bugs have also been fixed: Fixed the help menu sometimes becoming unresponsive. Fixed an issue where some text effects were not updating properly Fixed some bugs related to grouped elements Makes random effects more random Music stopped on previews when selecting media assets Fixes blend modes for some image effects
Fixes a bug for those running an older version of iOS
Several minor bug fixes

Another big update. It optimizes and simplifies video clip retiming for super smooth slowmo! There is also now a special option for reversing video clips. Text elements have two additional shadow options making them much more realistic. A number of bugs have also been fixed to improve the stability of large projects.
This set is for typography fans! More than twenty new fonts and 25 new text animation presets. Also: Two new types of text alignment and now you can switch text between uppercase and regular letters.
Fixed an issue where the play button would stop working
A few minor fixes here and there
Some minor bug fixes
Three new templates and now you can duplicate clips. Also fixed some bugs here and there.
Fixes several minor bugs and improves handling of clips in the timeline.
Some minor bug fixes
several minor bug fixes
Some minor fixes

Fixes a critical bug that caused the application to slow down and crash: Existing projects should be automatically converted. If you have problems try recreating the project from scratch. So onwards to a smoother faster and more stable Riveo!
Several minor fixes
Two new templates and lots of improvements under the hood!
Some minor bug fixes
Fixes a bug in effect preview on some devices
Fixes an issue where some buttons might not be selectable on some devices...
Minor bug fix

The biggest Riveo update ever. Now you can add stickers to your projects choose music from the built in library record audio tracks and take advantage of the updated recording stream. Also new templates and some fixes here and there! Let me know what you think! Marcus

A number of templates have been updated. This update also fixes an issue where the menu would not open. Fixes display errors on older devices for some effects. Fixes Chinese and Portuguese localizations.
Small bug fixes here and there
Fixes a bug when recording with the camera and beauty filter turned on
Huge accessibility update! Riveo now supports Voice Over and Dynamic Type making the app better for everyone. Also four new templates and some tweaks here and there.
Transitions transitions transitions! Riveo now comes with 33 additional transitions and they can now even overlap each other to create a smoother more dynamic look.

This update adds 12 new butterfly effects that integrate dynamically simulated butterflies into your compositions! Also some bugs have been fixed here and there and the user interface has been tweaked.
Fixes a crash when closing the first project and not saving it.
Minor fixes. What s not to like
Fixes some minor selection errors.
Fixes an issue where retimed clips were not rendered properly. Remastered a number of effects after some internal changes. And a few fixes here and there. Added support for iOS 13.
Fixes a bug when displaying HDR video Fixes crash on startup for devices running iOS 14. Fixes a bug related to masking
Fixes a bug with the text blur effect. Fixes a bug with elements disappearing for the duration of a frame.

Four new cracked screen effects. Fixed a bug where long pressing on some items did not go into selection mode. Fixed a crash when quickly scrolling through effect previews on older devices. Memory improvements.
Fixes an issue where selecting part of a video clip would reset its timing. Fixes animation. Fixes interaction with the preview screen. And some behind the scenes fixes.

This is for advanced users. New gestures for converting clips to overlays and vice versa. Alternatively long press on any item on the timeline and drag it down to delete it. New scanlines and jumbotron filters. Also as always bug fixes and the like.

This congratulation is addressed to all animators! Keyframe animation has been reworked so that you can change easing between keyframes and animate properties individually rather than all or none. I ve added a keyframe editor so you can quickly edit move and delete keyframes. You can also set blend modes and opacity for images and videos. The help screen has been adjusted and expanded with new tips for getting the most out of Riveo. The user interface has been tweaked in many places to allow for more gestures and an overall smoother experience. I fixed the problem with color selection. Text fill effects should now look smoother. The problem with dropped frames in some videos has also been resolved. A number of bugs have been fixed here and there.

A lot happened! Text rendering is faster and looks better. There are two new text effects and two new templates. There are also many improvements in memory handling making Riveo faster and more stable for large projects. Marcus
Fixed an issue where audio settings were not being respected properly thanks Avril! . Also fixed an issue where thumbnails would randomly disappear.
Minor bug fixes
Fixes some crashes on older devices
So much new. 20 new Effects! And five new templates. New presets for creating photorealistic effects of fire smoke and much more. And as always several bug fixes and improvements. Marcus
Fixes a bug where some videos were not rendered.

Particle effects now work much faster! They can also be masked replaced and new properties can be configured. I also reworked the preview. Retiming video clips has also become much faster. Some memory improvements will this ever end and fixes here and there. Marcus
Minor bug fixes
Fixes crash in low memory situations
Fixes a crash when clicking the cancel button after adding a shape element.

Figures figures figures. This update allows you to add rectangles circles and the like to your compositions. You can also create your own shapes. This adds a ton of possibilities for creating new layouts and styles. Some bug fixes. And some Russian localization fixes! Thanks again Anton! Marcus
Gradients! You can now add and animate linear radial and mesh gradients. Just tap the plus icon and swipe over it to select a gradient. Also fixed some bugs here and there. Enjoy! Marcus
Fixes some rare rendering crashes.
Some minor bug fixes.
Improved Russian localization thanks again Anton! . And some bug fixes for certain effects when rendering at higher Resolutions.
Fixes rare crashes with particle effects.

HD and 4K are finally here! Now you can render in different resolutions and frame rates. There are many performance and memory improvements to make the Riveo experience even better. And finally thanks to our user Anton there is now an improved Russian localization! We are still finalizing some things but now everything should be much clearer for our Russian users : We hope you enjoy it! Marcus
Fixes a crash when working with silhouette masks. Or so I hope.

You can now add shadows to image and video overlays as well as text elements! There s a new transition for video clips and I ve also improved the performance of several effects. So many of your projects and templates should run much faster. And as always improvements and fixes here and there. Enjoy! Marcus
This update adds better AI masks. It allows you to convert clips to overlays and vice versa. Added color picker to select colors from the current scene. And as always bug fixes and improvements.
Now you can make your favorite templates that you often use. This update also fixes some layout and performance issues on the Home screen.
Several minor bug fixes.
Fixes a bug with the effect and image masks.
Seven new filters to turn your videos into beautiful line art! Also three new templates and now you can mask overlay media! Enjoy Marcus
Fixes a bug when replacing some videos.
That s cool! New interactive onboarding for new and existing users just go to settings introduction . There are also four new curtain transitions. Enjoy it! Marcus
Fixes a crash when opening the music selection
Riveo is now available in Russian and Portuguese! Also a few minor fixes here and there : Marcus
Finally Riveo is now available in Spanish and Chinese. This update also adds several new fonts for Chinese characters. Enjoy! Marcus
Minor bug fixes and logging improvements.
Fixes to push notifications. Once more. With feeling.
This update adds better sound controls and tools to tweak image and video colors without having to apply a filter. And as always some bug fixes here and there.

Lots of new stuff! A Stranger Things inspired text effect and template three new bokeh effects a new bokeh template and a ton of new fonts! Also some bug fixes: Videos would sometimes pause playback when returning to the app. Fixes an issue where audio wouldn t play for some videos shoutout to Frank! . Fixed some template layout issues on iPad. Fixed some camera issues on older devices. And some minor fixes here and there. Marcus
Minor bug fixes.

This is a good one! Every filter and effect can automatically mask out a person or the background using AI. That makes combining filters and effects quite a bit more powerful! Also two new psychedelic effects a luminance map and four new templates!

Added a tips screen to better illustrate the basics. The mask tool has been tweaked for a bit more ease of use. You can now also rotate any masks. Some fixes around non latin scrip some fixes here and there. Marcus
Riveo is now available in French! Also fixes an audio bug on one of the tutorial videos and some smaller crash fixes.

Four new effects four new templates and every template is now also automatically sized to best fit the selected media. Also improved memory handling improved sharing via the share sheet and some minor fixes here and there.
Fixes a small mini tutorial bug.
Fixes a smaller bug with the mini tutorials.

Added mini tutorials for teaching you the basics. Plus six new effects for smoothing your appearance or adding anamorphic lights to your videos. Four new templates as well as faster motion fx! And lastly smaller bug fixes and enhancements.
Smaller fixes around sharing manipulating a text gradient and you can now sign up for notifications!

Fancy Text! You can now add gradients to your text and animate them. And check out the new templates that demonstrate what you can do with the new feature. I ve also made some smaller quality of life improvements here and there.
Fixes a few bugs around particle selection and arabic text support.
Fixes a crash with right to left script e.g. Arabic . Tweaks ruler selection behavior on iPad.

Four new templates for an authentic 80s look magazine style transitions or dreams. And I ve added experimental support for non latin script. Also fixes a number of text layout bugs and some rare crashes when rewinding footage or duplicating a filter item.
Added German localization.

We ve added animated icons for each settings. So when you tweak any effect the icons will give you a clearer picture of what each setting does! We ve added support for the share sheet added a new template and fixed some interactions bugs on the iPad along with some crashes.

This is a big one. With a redesigned start screen and templates to quickly create and apply effects. You can now also long press on any item overlay indicator in the timeline and it will let you reposition it. You can now select multiple media at once when starting a project. The media selection has been redesigned. You can now also replace items without having to delete and re add them letting you keep any changes you made. A new curves effect for professional color control currently only available via select templates . The cutout control was added for clips aka the non overlay video and image items More memory management improvements Better control for the vignette effect strength Fixed a bug in the shine effect Fixed a bug where the Futura font would show up as another
Some smaller quality of life fixes and improvements to memory handling.
Fixes a bug where the help menu would not come up.
Various bug fixes.

Transitions! You get your standard cross fade and camera pan but then there are those you ve never seen before. Transitions like flipping through a magazine rolling up a piece of paper or a prism refracting from one clip to the next. Also some minor fixes along selecting items on the canvas and improved sharing. And clips are now automatically saved once you ve renderem them.
Fixes audio quality for renders. Fixes a bug with image styles and an applied corner radius. Fixes a bug where the purchase screen would become unresponsive.
Fixes bugs with text previews Fixes a bug where the help view wouldn t come up. Fixes a bug related to text borders. Fixes a bug where repositioned music would not update.
